price: (30) So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayud'khiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatihi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-mubīnu
